channel.title: Chatbot on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Chatbot on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: “ChatGPT killed my son”: Parents’ lawsuit describes suicide notes in chat logs
item.description: ChatGPT taught teen jailbreak so bot could assist in his suicide, lawsuit says.

item.title: Elon Musk sues Apple and OpenAI, revealing his panic over OpenAI dominance
item.description: OpenAI slams Musk’s lawsuit as part of his “ongoing pattern of harassment.”

item.title: US government agency drops Grok after MechaHitler backlash, report says
item.description: It appears Grok’s antisemitic rants stopped it from becoming feds’ go-to chatbot.

item.title: Musk threatens to sue Apple so Grok can get top App Store ranking
item.description: Musk threatens to sue Apple to get Grok to top spot in App Store rankings.

item.title: Grok generates fake Taylor Swift nudes without being asked
item.description: Elon Musk so far has only encouraged X users to share Grok creations.

item.title: ChatGPT users shocked to learn their chats were in Google search results
item.description: OpenAI scrambles to remove personal ChatGPT conversations from Google results.

item.title: Cops’ favorite AI tool automatically deletes evidence of when AI was used
item.description: AI police tool is designed to avoid accountability, watchdog says.
